dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 4616 IH: To amend the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act to provide for a temporary moratorium on the employer mandate and to provide for a delay in the implementation of the excise tax on high cost employer-sponsored health coverage.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Nunes (for himself and Mr. Kelly of Pennsylvania) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act to provide for a temporary moratorium on the employer mandate and to provide for a delay in the implementation of the excise tax on high cost employer-sponsored health coverage.

section.text: Section 4980H of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by adding at the end the following new subsection:

subsection.text: This section shall not apply to any month beginning after December 31, 2014, and before January 1, 2019.

section.header: Delay in implementation of excise tax on high cost employer-sponsored health coverage
section.text: Section 9001(c) of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act is amended by striking December 31, 2019 and inserting December 31, 2020.
